  1. Learning about the High Resolution Time API today, chiefly that performance.timeOrigin reports when the initial *request* is made. If I sleep the response for 10 seconds, it’ll precede those 10 seconds 🎉 w3c.github.io/hr-time/#sec-performance should I have known this already? *maybe* 🤫
